trans-unit.source: Describes a string of characters.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferRange" /> structure.
An unmanaged pointer reference to a character string.
trans-unit.target: 문자열에 대한 관리되지 않는 포인터 참조입니다.

trans-unit.source: The number of characters in <c>unsafecharacterString</c> to use.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferRange" /> structure from a unmanaged character string.
trans-unit.target: 관리되지 않는 문자열의 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferRange" /> 구조체에 대한 새 인스턴스를 초기화합니다.

trans-unit.source: The caller needs unmanaged code permission in order to invoke the <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferRange.%23ctor%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 호출자가 호출 하려면 비관리 코드 권한이 <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferRange.%23ctor%2A> 메서드.

trans-unit.source: The character array.
The character buffer offset to the first character.
trans-unit.target: 첫 번째 문자의 문자 버퍼 오프셋입니다.

trans-unit.source: The number of characters in <c>characterArray</c> to use.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferRange" /> structure from a character array.
trans-unit.target: 문자 배열로부터 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferRange" /> 구조체의 새 인스턴스를 초기화합니다.

trans-unit.source: The character string.
The character buffer offset to the first character.
trans-unit.target: 첫 번째 문자의 문자 버퍼 오프셋입니다.

trans-unit.source: The number of characters in <c>characterString</c> to use.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferRange" /> structure from a character string.
Gets a reference to the character buffer of a string.
trans-unit.target: 문자열의 문자 버퍼에 대한 참조를 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferReference" /> value representing the character buffer of a string.
Gets an empty character string.
A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferRange" /> object whose <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferRange.Length" /> is equal to 0.
Determines whether the specified object is equal to the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferRange" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 지정한 개체와 현재 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferRange" /> 개체가 같은지 여부를 확인합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Object" /> to compare with the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferRange" /> object.
Determines whether the specified object is equal to the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferRange" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 지정한 개체와 현재 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferRange" /> 개체가 같은지 여부를 확인합니다.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="o" /> is equal to the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferRange" /> object; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="o" />이 현재 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferRange" /> 개체와 같으면 <see langword="true" />이고, 그렇지 않으면 <see langword="false" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: If <paramref name="o" /> is not a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferRange" /> object, <see langword="false" /> is returned.

Two <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferRange> objects are equal if the <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferRange.CharacterBufferReference%2A> properties are equal.
trans-unit.target: 두 개의 <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferRange> 개체가 서로 같은지 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferRange.CharacterBufferReference%2A> 속성이 같은지 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferRange" /> to compare with the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferRange" /> object.

Determines whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferRange" /> object is equal to the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferRange" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferRange" /> 개체가 현재 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferRange" /> 개체와 같은지 여부를 확인합니다.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="value" /> is equal to the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferRange" /> object; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" />이 현재 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferRange" /> 개체와 같으면 <see langword="true" />이고, 그렇지 않으면 <see langword="false" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: If <paramref name="value" /> is not a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferRange" /> object, <see langword="false" /> is returned.

Two <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferRange> objects are equal if the <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferRange.CharacterBufferReference%2A> properties are equal.
trans-unit.target: 두 개의 <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferRange> 개체가 서로 같은지 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferRange.CharacterBufferReference%2A> 속성이 같은지 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Serves as a hash function for <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferRange" />.
It is suitable for use in hashing algorithms and data structures such as a hash table.
trans-unit.target: 해시 알고리즘 및 해시 테이블과 같은 데이터 구조에서 사용하기에 적합합니다.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> value that represents the hash code for the current object.
trans-unit.target: 현재 개체에 대한 해시 코드를 나타내는 <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of characters in the text source character store.
trans-unit.target: 텍스트 소스 문자 저장소의 문자 수를 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> value that represents the total number of characters.
trans-unit.target: 전체 문자 수를 나타내는 <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: The first instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferRange" /> to compare.
The second instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferRange" /> to compare.
Compare two <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferRange" /> strings for equality.
<see langword="true" /> to show the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferRange" /> objects are equal; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferRange" /> 개체가 같으면 <see langword="true" />이고, 그렇지 않으면 <see langword="false" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: The first instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferRange" /> to compare.
The second instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferRange" /> to compare.
Compare two <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferRange" /> strings for inequality.
<see langword="false" /> to show <paramref name="left" /> is equal to <paramref name="right" />; otherwise, <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="left" />가 <paramref name="right" />와 같으면 <see langword="false" />이고, 그렇지 않으면 <see langword="true" />입니다.
